values:
so ya, i haven't written in here in an extremely long time, about 7 or 8 months i'd say!!  i mean fuck, i had just met Johnny (ehh) when i last wrote in this, long ass time ago, but anyways...  school has started up again, i'm a big ass junior, only it's not as cool as it sounds!!  i hate school, last week was one of the worst weeks of my life, and now i'm sitting here, eating vegetable lasagna for the 3rd time in the past 2 days (well, i'm not complaining about that)  i started writing in here again though, cuz this kid in my physics class was like, "live journals raaar"  so ya, here i am, "debating the value of failure in ones life"  i hope everyones doing ok!!
PEACE

this weekend has been pretty fun so far!!  THREE DAY WEEKENDS KICK ASS!!  but i got back from my Daddy's today!  we went to the mall yesterday and did some mad shopping!  and we went to Trader Joe's and the really hot guy that works there was working that day!  (Yvonne knows who i'm talking about!)  i know i know, "oi vey!"  lol, he is really sexy though!  but anyways!  i got to talk to my Buddy and Sara while i was there, good times good times!!  but i watched Fast Times at Ridgemont High again, man i love that movie by the bunches!!  so there's no skool tomorrow but i have no idea what i'm doing!!  fun fun fun in the California sun!!  Yvonne showed me this website where this guy gives definitions for all these hella ghetto words, it's so great!!  go to http://www.thesource4ym.com/teenlingo/index.asp
it's hilarious!!  well i suppose that is all for today!
*love is giving someone the ability to destroy you, but trusting them not too*

so there's this guy at my skool who is sooooooo sexy!  we've been talking, and he is soooo my match!  i mean, we both love Hanson and dog porn, honestly, could it get any better?  nope, it can't!  do you wanna know his name?  ya, i bet you do, but hmm, should i tell you?  oh ok... JOHNNY!!  lmao!  
he is soooooo cute and hot and he loves sexing with dogs just like me... 
*mmmbop*

today was the BEST!!  i mean honestly, i deeply enjoyed it, thoroughly!  so today was the pancake breakfast at skool!!  there's pancakes, bagels, coffee, juice, and sausage (for all you meat eaters!)  and best of all, everything is... FREE!!!!  that's right, i said it, FREE!!  nothings better than when the words food and free are used in the same sentence!  
then after skool my Momma took me to do some c-c-c-crazy shopping!  it awesome!  i got 2 pairs of pants, 4 shirts, 1 sweater, 1 dress, and 1 purse!! if Gucci were here right now she would most definately say, "Holy cheese and rice!"  
i think i should end every entry with a quote, or lyrics to a song from now on!
*to the window, to the wall, to the sweat drip down my balls, to all these bitches crawl, to all skit skit motherfucker, to all skit skit god damn*

i wanna thank my one and only... Buddy!  thank you soooo much for puting together this gorgeous journal!  i couldn't have done it without you, literally!!  you are soooo sexy, and i wanna have your babies ALL night long!  you are truly a P-I-M-P!  i love you sooooooo much!!!!
